text: Coly-Saint-Amand is a commune in the Dordogne department in Nouvelle-Aquitaine in southwestern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Saint-Amand-de-Coly (the seat) and Coly.Arrêté préfectoral 21 September 2018, p. 38 ==See also== *Communes of the Dordogne department ==References== Category:Communes of Dordogne
title: Coly-Saint-Amand
